alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Monroe; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:39PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN WAYNE...EASTERN ORLEANS...MONROE AND NORTHEASTERN GENESEE COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM EDT... At 239 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Holley to Chili to Penfield to near Palmyra. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Greece, Irondequoit, Chili, Brockport, East Rochester, Hilton, Webster, Fairport, Brighton, Hamlin Beach State Park, Gates-North Gates, Ontario, Henrietta, Penfield, Newark, Williamson, Marion, Spencerport, and Palmyra. This includes Interstate 390 near exit 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
